title.narrative: OxItaly Protection and HP for migrants

description.narrative:
General Objective: To contribute to ensuring that the safety, dignity and human rights of all people on the move are respected and their access to essential services in Greece is granted.
Specific objective: To adapt the social services and psychosocial support to asylum seekers in Greece to the new constraints posed by COVID-19 and beyond. Oxfam Italy will provide technical support to the project through it's regional coordinator and it's regional technical advisor. The Regional coordinator is in charge of ensuring the coherency of the European Migration Response Program and the quality of the program according to Oxfam humanitarian standards. S/he ensures the liaison of the program with the global humanitarian team and is accountable for it. Within the CDCS project, s/he willensure the coherency of the project with the whole program, providing strategic steer where necessary. S/he will also visit the project locations to meet the partners. The Regional technical advisor is in charge of supporting the development of the European Migration Response Program, through the scouting of funding opportunities related to migration in Europe both from institutional and private donors, and through supporting the country teams in pursuing them. S/he also ensures the donor compliance and that Oxfam bidding process is secured. S/he is in charge of coordinating an inter-affiliate funding group to seek funding opportunities through affiliates home donors and other common donors. Within the CDCS project, s/he will support the project team in seeking additional funds for the activities in Greece, on the basis of the needs emerging during the project implementation.

participating-org.narrative: Oxfam Italia (OIT) is an Italian NGO, non-profit association, member of Oxfam International Confederation. Oxfam Italia main areas of intervention are: 1. Development cooperation and humanitarian aid. Oxfam Italia promotes and develops international cooperation projects in different areas of intervention (as agricultural and rural development, vocational trainings, health, strengthening of social public services and economic development, as well as humanitarian aid, local disaster prevention and environmental protection).Oxfam Italia operates in South East Europe, Middle East, Latin America, Africa and Asia. 2. Campaigns and Education for Active and Global Citizenship. Oxfam carries on priority focused on: inequality, food, ending violence against women and girls, and humanitarian and conflict issues. 3. Domestic Programmes. Oxfam Italia carries out projects in local community development, working with asylumseekers, refugees and migrants, ensuring their social inclusion and integration and their access to services.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to life and security
